ingredients.ingredient: 14 ounces giant white corn (such as Goya®)

cookingTips: Drain and dry canned corn thoroughly to remove excess moisture for crispier nuts
Toss corn with oil and salt in a bowl before air frying for even coating
Shake the basket occasionally during cooking for uniform browning and crispiness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through making homemade corn nuts with proper seasoning and crispiness.
